The table gives values for a polynomial function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> at selected values of <math alttext="x"> <mi>x</mi> </math>.
content.question: What is the average rate of change of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> over the closed interval <math alttext="open square brackets 1 comma 4 close square brackets"> <mfenced close="]" open="["> <mrow> <mn>1</mn> <mo>,</mo> <mn>4</mn> </mrow> </mfenced> </math> ?

topic.text: 1.3: Rates of Change in Linear and Quadratic Functions

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
